questions.question: What does Chandler say Snoopy should not be allowed to do?
options: Fly a plane
Fly this thing
Go to the moon
Be a superhero
questions.correct_answer: Fly this thing
questions.explanation: Chandler questions whether Snoopy should still be allowed to fly 'this thing' given his age in dog years.

questions.question: Why does Ross want to sell Brown Bird cookies?
options: To help his daughter
To help a poor little girl go to Spacecamp
To buy a new car
To pay for his vacation
questions.correct_answer: To help a poor little girl go to Spacecamp
questions.explanation: Ross wants to sell cookies to help a little girl named Sarah go to Spacecamp.

questions.question: What is Phoebe's objection to Joey's job selling Christmas trees?
options: The trees are too expensive
The trees are not environmentally friendly
Innocent trees are being cut down in their prime
The trees are not the right type
questions.correct_answer: Innocent trees are being cut down in their prime
questions.explanation: Phoebe is against the idea of cutting down trees, considering it as killing innocent trees in their prime.

questions.question: What does Rachel decide to do after talking to Chandler and Joey about her job?
options: She decides to stay at her current job
She decides to quit her job and pursue a career in fashion
She decides to go back to school
She decides to travel the world
questions.correct_answer: She decides to quit her job and pursue a career in fashion
questions.explanation: Rachel decides to quit her job as a waitress to pursue a career in fashion.

questions.question: What is the name of the company where Rachel gets a job interview?
options: Fortunata Fashions
Fashion Forward
Style Inc.
Trendy Designs
questions.correct_answer: Fortunata Fashions
questions.explanation: Joey's father is doing a plumbing job at Fortunata Fashions, where they have an opening and Joey offers to get Rachel an interview.

questions.question: Why does Ross sell a large number of Brown Bird cookies?
options: He targets the NYU dorms around midnight when students have the munchies
He sells cookies at the park
He sells cookies at the mall
He sells cookies at the beach
questions.correct_answer: He targets the NYU dorms around midnight when students have the munchies
questions.explanation: Ross discovers that targeting students with the munchies at NYU dorms around midnight is the key to his success in selling cookies.

questions.question: What is the outcome of the Brown Bird cookie sales contest?
options: Ross wins the contest
A little girl named Elizabeth wins the contest
A 19-year-old girl wins the contest by selling over 2000 boxes
The contest ends in a tie
questions.correct_answer: A 19-year-old girl wins the contest by selling over 2000 boxes
questions.explanation: A 19-year-old girl, who borrowed her younger sister's Brown Bird uniform, wins the contest by selling over 2000 boxes of cookies.

questions.question: What does Rachel do on her last night working at Central Perk?
options: She spills coffee on a customer
She serves her last cup of coffee and says goodbye to her friends
She argues with Gunther
She breaks a cup
questions.correct_answer: She serves her last cup of coffee and says goodbye to her friends
questions.explanation: On her last night working at Central Perk, Rachel serves her last cup of coffee and says goodbye to her friends.

questions.question: What is the name of the little girl whose leg Ross breaks?
options: Sarah Tuttle
Elizabeth
Debbie
Charla
questions.correct_answer: Sarah Tuttle
questions.explanation: The little girl whose leg Ross breaks is named Sarah Tuttle.

questions.question: What is the 'tray spot' that Gunther mentions to Rachel?
options: A club that the waitresses go to
A spot where the waitresses take their breaks
A spot where the waitresses put the empty trays
A spot where the waitresses store their tips
questions.correct_answer: A spot where the waitresses put the empty trays
questions.explanation: Gunther explains to Rachel that the 'tray spot' is where the waitresses put the empty trays, which is closer to the mugs.

questions.question: What does Ross create for Sarah after she doesn't get to go to Spacecamp?
options: A private Spacecamp in his apartment
A model of the space shuttle
A space-themed birthday party
A trip to the moon
questions.correct_answer: A private Spacecamp in his apartment
questions.explanation: Ross creates a private Spacecamp for Sarah in Joey and Chandler's apartment after she doesn't get to go to the real Spacecamp.

questions.question: What does Phoebe see happening to the old Christmas trees at Joey's work?
options: They are being recycled
They are being donated to charity
They are being thrown into a chipper
They are being sold to another store
questions.correct_answer: They are being thrown into a chipper
questions.explanation: Phoebe is horrified when she sees the old Christmas trees being thrown into a chipper at Joey's work.

questions.question: Why does Monica start eating the Brown Bird cookies?
options: Because she is hungry
Because she wants to support Ross
Because she has a weakness for cookies
Because she wants to get rid of them
questions.correct_answer: Because she has a weakness for cookies
questions.explanation: Monica starts eating the Brown Bird cookies because she has a weakness for them and can't resist.

questions.question: What does Joey use to decorate Monica's window for Christmas?
options: Snow-in-a-can
Glitter
Tinsel
Lights
questions.correct_answer: Snow-in-a-can
questions.explanation: Joey uses 'snow-in-a-can' to decorate Monica's window for Christmas.

questions.question: What does Rachel finally get at the end of the episode?
options: A new job at Fortunata Fashions
A promotion at Central Perk
A raise at Central Perk
A new apartment
questions.correct_answer: A new job at Fortunata Fashions
questions.explanation: Rachel finally gets a new job at Fortunata Fashions after a successful interview.

questions.question: What is Ross's excuse for buying a large number of Brown Bird cookies?
options: He has a nuget diffency
He is trying to support the Brown Birds
He wants to eat them all himself
He is trying to win a contest
questions.correct_answer: He has a nuget diffency
questions.explanation: Ross makes up an excuse about having a 'nuget diffency' to explain why he bought a large number of Brown Bird cookies.

questions.question: What is the name of the drink that Mr. Kaplan Sr. likes strong?
options: Coffee
Tea
Hot chocolate
Juice
questions.correct_answer: Coffee
questions.explanation: Mr. Kaplan Sr. likes his coffee strong, so Rachel is instructed to use two bags instead of one.

questions.question: What is the reaction of the gang when Rachel announces she got the job at Fortunata Fashions?
options: They are all upset
They are all surprised
They are all happy and cheering
They are all indifferent
questions.correct_answer: They are all happy and cheering
questions.explanation: The gang is happy and cheering when Rachel announces she got the job at Fortunata Fashions.

questions.question: What does Gunther do when Rachel announces she is quitting her job?
options: He tries to convince her to stay
He gets angry and yells at her
He starts crying and runs into the back room
He offers her a raise
questions.correct_answer: He starts crying and runs into the back room
questions.explanation: Gunther is emotional and starts crying when Rachel announces she is quitting her job, and he runs into the back room.

questions.question: What is the reason for Phoebe's emotional reaction to the Christmas trees?
options: She loves Christmas trees
She hates Christmas trees
She is reminded of her mother's death
She is worried about the environment
questions.correct_answer: She is reminded of her mother's death
questions.explanation: Phoebe's emotional reaction to the Christmas trees is because she is reminded of her mother's death, which occurred around Christmas time.

questions.question: What does Joey try to do to help Rachel after she quits her job?
options: He tries to convince her to go back to her old job
He offers to help her find a new job
He gives her money to help her out
He tries to cheer her up with a joke
questions.correct_answer: He offers to help her find a new job
questions.explanation: Joey tries to help Rachel by offering to help her find a new job, specifically by getting her an interview at Fortunata Fashions.

questions.question: What is the result of Ross's attempt to sell Brown Bird cookies to a woman in the hallway?
options: She buys a box of cookies from him
She is not interested and tells him to go away
She calls the police on him
She invites him in for a cup of coffee
questions.correct_answer: She is not interested and tells him to go away
questions.explanation: The woman in the hallway is not interested in buying cookies from Ross and tells him to go away, even threatening to call the police.

questions.question: What does Monica try to do when she finds out that Ross has sold all the mint treasure cookies?
options: She tries to buy more from another Brown Bird
She tries to convince Ross to give her more
She tries to bake her own cookies
She runs out of the room
questions.correct_answer: She tries to convince Ross to give her more
questions.explanation: Monica tries to convince Ross to give her more mint treasure cookies, even offering to pay for them.

questions.question: What is the name of the planetarium where Ross has success selling Brown Bird cookies?
options: The Hayden Planetarium
The New York Planetarium
The Planetarium at the Museum of Natural History
The U.S.S. Nimitz planetarium
questions.correct_answer: The planetarium at the 'Laser Floyd' show
questions.explanation: Ross has success selling Brown Bird cookies at the 'Laser Floyd' show at the planetarium.

questions.question: What is the reaction of the gang when they see the old Christmas trees in Monica and Rachel's apartment?
options: They are all upset
They are all surprised
They are all happy and cheering
They are all indifferent
questions.correct_answer: They are all happy and cheering
questions.explanation: The gang is happy and cheering when they see the old Christmas trees in Monica and Rachel's apartment, which Joey and Monica had saved from being thrown away.

questions.question: What does Chandler do when Rachel is upset about not getting the job at Fortunata Fashions?
options: He tries to cheer her up with a joke
He offers to help her find another job
He tells her to give up on her dreams
He runs away
questions.correct_answer: He tries to cheer her up with a joke
questions.explanation: Chandler tries to cheer Rachel up with a joke when she is upset about not getting the job at Fortunata Fashions.

questions.question: What is the name of the boss who tells Rachel how to make coffee at her new job?
options: Mr. Kaplan Sr.
Mr. Kaplan Jr.
Rachel's Boss
The Coffee Shop Manager
questions.correct_answer: Rachel's Boss
questions.explanation: Rachel's boss at her new job tells her how to make coffee, specifically how to use two bags instead of one for Mr. Kaplan Sr.

questions.question: What does Phoebe try to do to help the old Christmas tree at Joey's work?
options: She tries to convince Joey to save it
She tries to buy it from Joey
She tries to give it to Monica
She tries to throw it away
questions.correct_answer: She tries to convince Joey to save it
questions.explanation: Phoebe tries to convince Joey to save the old Christmas tree at his work, saying it can still fulfill its Christmas destiny.
